definition: to flit, i.e. vanish away (subside, escape; causatively, chase, impel, deliver)
kjvTranslation: [idiom] abate, away, be displayed, (make to) flee (away, -ing), put to flight, [idiom] hide, lift up a standard.

translations.bg: да прелита, т.е. да изчезва (утихва, избягва; в каузативно значение - преследва, подтиква, доставя)
translations.cs: odletět, tj. zmizet (ustoupit, uniknout; kauzativně pronásledovat, pohánět, vysvobodit)
translations.da: at flyve, dvs. forsvinde (aftage, undslippe; kausativt, jage, drive, levere)
translations.de: flitzen, d.h. verschwinden (untergehen, entkommen; ursächlich jagen, treiben, befreien)
translations.el: να φτερουγίζει, δηλαδή να εξαφανίζεται (να υποχωρεί, να ξεφεύγει- αιτιωδώς, να κυνηγάει, να ωθεί, να παραδίδει)
translations.es: revolotear, es decir, desvanecerse (disminuir, escapar; causativamente, perseguir, impulsar, entregar)
translations.et: lennata, s.t. kaduda (allapoole, põgeneda; kausatiivselt, taga ajada, ajendada, toimetada)
translations.fi: liehua, ts. kadota pois (alentua, paeta; kausatiivisesti, ajaa takaa, ajaa, pakottaa, luovuttaa)
translations.fr: s'envoler, c'est-à-dire disparaître (s'atténuer, s'échapper ; au sens causal, poursuivre, pousser, délivrer)
translations.hu: elrepülni, azaz eltűnni (alábbhagyni, elmenekülni; kauzálisan: kergetni, hajtani, szállítani)
translations.id: to flit, yaitu lenyap (mereda, melarikan diri; secara kausalitas, mengejar, mendorong, mengantarkan)
translations.it: svolazzare, cioè svanire (abbassarsi, sfuggire; causalmente, inseguire, spingere, consegnare)
translations.ja: 飛び去る、すなわち消え去る（沈む、逃げる；使役的に、追いかける、駆り立てる、送り届ける）
translations.ko: 날아가다, 즉 사라지다(가라앉다, 탈출하다; 원인적으로, 추격하다, 추진하다, 전달하다)
translations.lt: skraidyti, t. y. išnykti (nurimti, pabėgti; priežastingai - persekioti, skatinti, pristatyti)
translations.lv: lidot, t.i., pazust (izzust, aizbēgt; cēloņsakarīgi - dzīt, dzenāt, dzīt, nogādāt)
translations.nb: å flakse, dvs. forsvinne (avta, unnslippe; kausativt, jage, drive, levere)
translations.nl: wegvliegen, d.w.z. verdwijnen (wegzinken, ontsnappen; causaal, opjagen, aansporen, afleveren)
translations.pl: to flit, i.e. vanish away (subside, escape; causatively, chase, impel, deliver)
translations.pt: esvoaçar, ou seja, desaparecer (diminuir, escapar; causativamente, perseguir, impelir, entregar)
translations.ro: a zbura, adică a dispărea (a scădea, a scăpa; cauzal, a urmări, a împinge, a livra)
translations.ru: промелькнуть, т.е. исчезнуть (утихнуть, скрыться; каузативно, преследовать, побуждать, доставлять)
translations.sk: preletieť, t. j. zmiznúť (ustúpiť, uniknúť; kauzatívne prenasledovať, poháňať, vyslobodiť)
translations.sl: izginiti, tj. izginiti (izginiti, pobegniti; vzročno pregnati, spodbuditi, dostaviti)
translations.sv: att flacka, dvs. försvinna (subside, escape; causatively, chase, impel, deliver)
translations.tr: uçmak, yani kaybolmak (azalmak, kaçmak; nedensel olarak, kovalamak, itmek, teslim etmek)
translations.uk: летіти, тобто зникати (вщухати, втікати; каузативно, гнати, спонукати, доставляти)
translations.zh: 飞逝，即消失（消退、逃逸；因果关系上，追逐、推动、传递）。
